metadata.title: CVE-2023-46566 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in msoulier tftpy commit467017b844bf6e31745138a30e2509145b0c529c allows a remote attacker to causea denial of service via the parse function in the TftpPacketFactory class.

criterions.comment: tftpy package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
